TopicTitle: [Mod Craft] Carpathia Industries Kerbin SOI Cruiser.

Articles.Content:
Carpathia Industries Presents

The Kerbin SOI Cruiser

This spaceship is an unarmed, peacetime vehicle used for space travel within Kerbin's sphere of influence. Barely tested, and unlikely to even leave the atmosphere, this vessel may be used to transport at least 6 similar sized modules at one time to anywhere in your local planetary system.

At 481 parts in the VAB, lower end machines WILL lag and higher end machines might be able to handle it.

Mods used:

Mechjeb2-2.0.8.0 (I haven't looked for a newer version but upgrading should be possible)

A custom part of mine that is included in the download. Thanks to the Part Generator.

In all honesty, I really don't see much use for this vehicle. I just thought the good people of KSP would enjoy a battle cruiser type craft that could serve a purpose if refined a bit. It definitely requires some tweaking, maybe a little bit of a complete redesign, and some love:D.

Inspiration: I dunno. Wanted to build a big ol' cruiser thing:P.

Download: http://www./download/hz2jof0tk9pnj22/C.I._Cruiser.zip

Edited June 11, 2013 by GeneralHavan
